Literature.Title: New Cyclic Lipopeptides of the Iturin Class Produced by Saltern-Derived Bacillus sp. KCB14S006
Literature.Author: Son S, Ko SK, Jang M, Kim JW, Kim GS, Lee JK, Jeon ES, Futamura Y, Ryoo IJ, Lee JS, Oh H, Hong YS, Kim BY, Takahashi S, Osada H, Jang JH, Ahn JS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus 209P(no activity data),Escherichia coli(no activity data),Aspergillus flavus KCTC 6984(MIC=25µg/ml),Neurospora crassa KCTC 6079(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Candida tropicalis KCTC 7830(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Candida albicans KCTC 7678(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. cucumerinum KCTC 6084(MIC=25µg/ml),Alternaria brassicicola ATCC 96836(MIC=25µg/ml),Penicillium griseofulvum KCTC 6435(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=4.6µM),Rous sarcoma virus infected rat kidney cells src-NRK(IC50=5.2µM)
